pkgmetadata.longdescription: Murano======Murano Project introduces an application catalog, which allows applicationdevelopers and cloud administrators to publish various cloud-readyapplications in a browsable categorised catalog. Cloud users— including inexperienced ones — can then use the catalog tocompose reliable application environments with the push of a button.Project Resources-----------------* `Murano Official Documentation <http://murano.readthedocs.org>`_* Project status, bugs, and blueprints are tracked on `Launchpad <https://launchpad.net/murano>`_* Additional resources are linked from the project `Wiki <https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Murano>`_ page* `Python client <https://github.com/openstack/python-muranoclient>`_License-------Apache License Version 2.0 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
